A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved the whole movie. It started slow\, but picked up quick. I loved the twists on expectations. The characters got to be real people\, rather than archetypes in service to a plot. I loved that the answers to some of the mysteries in The Force Awakens were\, \"It doesn't matter.\" So what if Rey isn't the daughter of some awesome person we already love? Neither was Anakin. I can't wait to see where Kylo Ren's path leads. We'll get to see his true ambitions play out next movie\, because he's already killed his puppet master. And don't even get me started on how amazing Rose is. The scene where  Admiral Holdo rammed her ship into the empire's ship nearly made me cry. Every part of it was utterly beautiful.
